entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`TASK_ID` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `TITLE` TEXT NOT NULL, `CONTENT` TEXT NOT NULL, `IS_PINNED` INTEGER NOT NULL, `COLOR` TEXT NOT NULL, `TIME` TEXT, `IS_REPEATING` INTEGER NOT NULL, `IS_ARCHIVED` INTEGER NOT NULL, `UPDATED AT` TEXT NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`LABEL_ID` INTEGER, `LABEL` TEXT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`LABEL_ID`))
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`TASK_ID` INTEGER NOT NULL, `LABEL_ID` INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`TASK_ID`, `LABEL_ID`))

indices.name: index_TASK_LABEL_REL_TASK_ID
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_TASK_LABEL_REL_TASK_ID` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`TASK_ID`)

indices.name: index_TASK_LABEL_REL_LABEL_ID
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_TASK_LABEL_REL_LABEL_ID` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`LABEL_ID`)

contentSyncTriggers: CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_LABEL_FTS_BEFORE_UPDATE BEFORE UPDATE ON `LabelEntity` BEGIN DELETE FROM `LABEL_FTS` WHERE `docid`=OLD.`rowid`; END
CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_LABEL_FTS_BEFORE_DELETE BEFORE DELETE ON `LabelEntity` BEGIN DELETE FROM `LABEL_FTS` WHERE `docid`=OLD.`rowid`; END

CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_LABEL_FTS_AFTER_UPDATE AFTER UPDATE ON `LabelEntity` BEGIN INSERT INTO `LABEL_FTS`(`docid`, `LABEL`, `LABEL_ID`) VALUES (NEW.`rowid`, NEW.`LABEL`, NEW.`LABEL_ID`); END

CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_LABEL_FTS_AFTER_INSERT AFTER INSERT ON `LabelEntity` BEGIN INSERT INTO `LABEL_FTS`(`docid`, `LABEL`, `LABEL_ID`) VALUES (NEW.`rowid`, NEW.`LABEL`, NEW.`LABEL_ID`); END
entities.createSql: CREATE VIRTUAL TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` USING FTS4(`LABEL` TEXT NOT NULL, `LABEL_ID` INTEGER NOT NULL, content=`LabelEntity`)

setupQueries: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS room_master_table (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,identity_hash TEXT)
